full_text:
Impact Testing

Lesson
objectives

¢ Describe the impact testing process
« Predict the impact of changes to a rate book

| Purpose of impact testing Gi

Kalani
Rating Analyst

What is impact testing and what is it
used for in PolicyCenter?

ii i, Julia
You can use impact testing to Implementation a
see what effect changing the Architect
rate book and rate routines
have on a policy premium for

a group of policies.

!

| Impact testing process fa

tefreedss
Select policies from ImpactTestingPlugin.gs Create baseline
application DB periods

I
sO

Impact results Select rate books

| Policy selection for impact testing Gi

aN

¢ Before impact testing, consider what
policies are included in the run

¢ Impact testing can take a significant
amount of time

* Depends on the number of policies
and the underlying computer
hardware

Best Practice: Run impact testing on a

representative sample of policies

| Demonstration G

Impact Testing

click here

Note: The demonstration opens a new tab in your browser. When the demonstration ends, the
original course launch window appears. Return to this window to continue this presentation.

| Rating renewals as renewal transactions i

¢ Inthe base configuration:

« Renewals are not included in impact
testing

« Rates baseline and test policy periods as
submission jobs

* Impact testing can be configured to
rate as a renewal instead of
submission

| Additional configuration options Gi

¢ Write your own implementation of the
0 A impact testing plugin interface
* Customize how impact testing
creates test periods
« Example: You may want to create test

periods in another way (that is, copying
submissions or spinning off policies)

* Select alternate rate books in impact
testing

¢ Make these changes by writing your
own implementation of the impact
testing plugin

| Impact testing warnings and recommendations

Designed to work in a testing environment on a copy
of production data

Accessible only in development or test modes
Affects system performance

Creates test policy periods that are stored in the
database

Not accessible in production mode

Refer to the “Impact testing warnings and recommendations” article

in the PolicyCenter Application Guide for more details

Gi

Question

_- — Whatis the purpose of impact testing?
¢
4
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Answer

_- — Whatis the purpose of impact testing?

¢
oe To predict what will happen when a rate book changes.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD

Question

,- — Can impact testing be run in a production environment?

¢
4
¢

SS oe Oooo ee Oooo ooOoD

Answer

,- — Can impact testing be run in a production environment?

¢
oe No. Impact testing is designed to be run in a test environment on a copy of the

production data.

SS oe ooo ee oe oOoOe SoD

Lesson
objectives ¢ Describe the impact testing process

review « Predict the impact of changes to a rate book
